themes: City responsibility for increased arts funding
Recognition of diverse arts communities (Latino, Black, Asian)
Arts as a driver for tourism and residency
key_phrases: the onus of the city to increase support
multiple playwright hubs, growing comedy community, Latino, Black and Asian arts groups, diverse film festivals
core vibrancy that brings tourists and new residents
realistic funding that continues to put equity as its priority
barriers_identified: insufficient prioritization of equity in funding
solutions_proposed: increase city support for arts groups
continue to put equity as a funding priority
